page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT IN WYLAM
page.content: There is quite a lot of entertainment in Wylam for it's size. For people who are under 18 there is very little to do at night or throughout the day. About every six months there is a disco at the Institute but there is little else. There is a railway museum in Wylam which is quite interesting. For people over 18 there are four pubs in Wylam (q.v.) all of which are popular. There are also many other clubs you can join such as drama, tennis, football, badminton, cricket, etc.. For the 16 year olds there is a music band but as yet unheard of. With Wylam not being far from the city of Newcastle (about 10.5 miles) you can easily drive there or get other transport for entertainment.
